snippet: Carriers like Lufthansa and British Airways warned the European Union that its aviation carbon limits could lead to retaliation from foreign airlines.
abstract: Airbus and European carriers like Lufthansa and British Airways warn the European Union that its aviation carbon limits could lead to retaliation from foreign airlines.
lead_paragraph: Carriers like Lufthansa and British Airways warned the European Union that its aviation carbon limits could lead to retaliation from foreign airlines.

headline.seo: Airbus and European Airlines Seek Deal on Emissions
headline.main: European Airlines and Airbus Seek to Ease Emissions Rule
headline.print_headline: European Airlines and Airbus Seek to Ease Emissions Rule
